fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Level a person up, increasing their attack and defense by 1 level.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot level up the same person twice by any means.
- Roleblock immune.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the DSF, your first attribute no longer applies.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Either 2 leveled up players live to the end of the game or 3 leveled up players win.
